chunks.text: Confidence and self-esteem comes from being happy within ourselves.
Self-belief is the key.
Each of us is a ripe, juicy apple, but not everyone likes apples.
So many of us choose to become a banana so we fit in.
Not everyone likes bananas, so we become a pineapple or a mandarin.
But not everyone likes mandarin, so we just become confused fruit salad.
We need to be true to our apple-ness.
What are some things we can do to build
confidence and self-esteem? Mr. Bank Manager, I want to make a deposit in my emotional bank account.
I saw a nasty Facebook post about a person I know, and I choose not to share it. I also told the
person who posted it to delete it. What do you think?
Apple. Thank you
Hello Mr Bank Manager
I want to make a deposit into my emotional bank account
I've just got my school report and I have really improved in my mess
I worked really hard because I'm not good at mass
and I'm proud of my achievement
Hello Mr Bank Manager
I want to make a deposit into my community Emotional Bank account Hello Mr Bank Manager.
I want to make a deposit into my community emotional bank account
I was walking down the street and I saw rubbish on the footpath
and I picked it up because it affects all of us and our civic pride
Thank you
Hello Mr Bank Manager
I want to make a deposit into my friend's emotional bank account
because she is an awesome friend
and I just wanted to say thanks for being there for me.
Okay.
Okay.

text: Confidence and self-esteem comes from being happy within ourselves. Self-belief is the key. Each of us is a ripe, juicy apple, but not everyone likes apples. So many of us choose to become a banana so we fit in. Not everyone likes bananas, so we become a pineapple or a mandarin. But not everyone likes mandarin, so we just become confused fruit salad. We need to be true to our apple-ness. What are some things we can do to build confidence and self-esteem? Mr. Bank Manager, I want to make a deposit in my emotional bank account. I saw a nasty Facebook post about a person I know, and I choose not to share it. I also told the person who posted it to delete it. What do you think? Apple. Thank you Hello Mr Bank Manager I want to make a deposit into my emotional bank account I've just got my school report and I have really improved in my mess I worked really hard because I'm not good at mass and I'm proud of my achievement Hello Mr Bank Manager I want to make a deposit into my community Emotional Bank account Hello Mr Bank Manager. I want to make a deposit into my community emotional bank account I was walking down the street and I saw rubbish on the footpath and I picked it up because it affects all of us and our civic pride Thank you Hello Mr Bank Manager I want to make a deposit into my friend's emotional bank account because she is an awesome friend and I just wanted to say thanks for being there for me. Okay. Okay.
